duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of Systems Engineering Managers to provide support to Systems Engineers in generating growth within Commercial Accounts.
Drive enterprise-wide sales-related initiatives within Commercial Accounts.
Interact at a senior level with customers and partners to provide valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, technical evolutions, and business changes.
Ensure effective account planning is executed across the teams to deliver compelling business-focused solutions that address customers' security needs.
Develop and own outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives to drive pipeline and sales.
Lead portfolio expansion initiatives, upselling subscriptions and strategic solutions.
Manage successful evaluations and timely return of evaluation equipment.
Act as an escalation point for pre-sales and post-sales technical issues in the territory.
Develop, mentor, manage, and support reporting sales engineers.
Operate effectively with extended teams such as Support, Finance, Product Management, etc.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line, Systems Engineering management experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
